idea-plugin.name: ContextCraft- Copy Related Files
idea-plugin.description:
Copies the content of selected file and related files in the same package to clipboard.
Designed to help Java developers share code context with LLMs (Large Language Models) to reduce hallucinations and provide better context for code-related questions.
Features: - Automatically detects and copies related files based on references - Configurable depth of reference tracking - Smart content pruning to focus on relevant parts - Support for interface implementations - Preserves Javadoc comments
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0

  • Initial release with basic functionality
  • Support for Java and Kotlin files
  • Configurable reference depth
  • Interface implementation tracking
  • Smart content pruning
